(1) Welcome to Smart Notes!.text:
Welcome to Smart Notes where it is now square and not a rectange! (dont fact check that one :3)

Type on the "Enter Tag" replace "Tutorial" then press the button farthest down.

(2) Basic Intro.text:
How to create a new note!

1. Click "Create note" and write the title of the note.
2. Click on the title of the note on the list ->
3. In the blank area on the left, type here!
4. Save it!

(3) Tags.text:
How to add/remove tags!

1. Go to the list of notes and pick a note.
2. Below "Save note" is the List of Tags, This is where you add or delete tags.

1 = Add / 2 = Delete

3.1 On the text box below, type your tag name.
4.1 Click add note

3.2 In the list of tag, click the tag.
4.2 Click "Untag from note"
